articles.author: Josh Campbell, Melissa Alonso and Dakin Andone, CNN
articles.title: Casey White, the Alabama prisoner who escaped with a corrections officer, has been indicted for murder in her death
articles.description: Casey White, the inmate who escaped from an Alabama jail with corrections officer Vicky White, has been indicted for felony murder in connection to her death, according to Lauderdale County Circuit Court documents.

articles.title: 'It was a coup attempt': Hear from ex-GOP official on January 6 insurrection - CNN Video
articles.description: Ahead of Tuesday's critical January 6 hearing, CNN's Miguel Marquez speaks to a Republican official and Wisconsin voters on the importance of the hearings as issues of abortion rights and inflation continue to loom over the country.

articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: Analysis: Republicans are desperate to keep Trump from announcing for president before the midterms
articles.description: Republican leaders are trying to send a not-so-subtle signal to Donald Trump these days: Do NOT announce for president before the November midterm elections.

articles.title: Live updates: James Webb telescope images released
articles.description: NASA is releasing four high-resolution color images from its James Webb Space Telescope. Scientists say the pictures will change the way people see the universe. Follow here for live updates.

articles.author: Nicole Goodkind
articles.title: The euro and the US dollar are at parity for the first time in 20 years
articles.description: For the first time in 20 years, the exchange rate between the euro and the US dollar has reached parity -- meaning the two currencies are worth the same.
articles.content:
For the first time in 20 years, the exchange rate between the euro and the US dollar has reached parity meaning the two currencies are worth the same.

articles.title: Live updates: Russia's invasion of Ukraine
articles.description: Fatalities were reported after explosions rocked a town in the Russian-occupied Kherson region on Monday in an attack by Ukrainian forces, Russian state media said. The town is home to a key hydroelectric dam. Follow here for live updates.
